mapper.select:
select
from apply
and stu_id=#{stuId}
and te_id=#{teId} and apply_condition like 'å·²%'
mapper.insert: insert into apply (apply_id, stu_id, stu_name, te_id, te_name, apply_topic, apply_condition, apply_date) values (#{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTopic,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{applyCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
